T02D3726:49b-1: karma pra ma tha sa ma ya s'u tra sam gra ha /
T02D3726:49b-3: las dang po ba'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa /
T02D3726:49b-5: gsang sngags kyi rnam par thar ba'i sgor zhugs pa'i
T02D3726:49b-6: las dang po pa rnams kyi dam tshig mdor bstan
T02D3726:49b-7: pa / h'um rdor las byung ma thing ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i //
T02D3726:49b-8: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D3726:49b-9: sngags 'chang rnams kyis bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni //
T02D3726:49b-10: mdor bsdus brtse ba'i yid kyis bshad par bya //
T02D3726:49b-11: sdug bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can la //
T02D3726:49b-12: snying rjer ldan pas yongs la khyab pa dang //
T02D3726:49b-13: g-yo dang mi g-yo'i chos rnams ma skyes par //
T02D3726:49b-14: rtog pa'i shes rab snying rje'i gzhir bya'o //
T02D3726:49b-15: rtag tu dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang //
T02D3726:49b-16: shes bzhin ting 'dzin mchog la gnas par bya //
T02D3726:49b-17: dang por sngags pas srog gcod rku ba dang //
T02D3726:49b-18: 'khrig dang brdzun smra chang 'thung la sogs pa'i //
T02D3726:49b-19: tshul khrims sngags kyi rtsa bar sangs rgyas gsungs //
T02D3726:49b-20: de bas srog bzhin bslab pa bsrung bar bya //
T02D3726:49b-22: yul gangs ri'i rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon dzny'am
T02D3726:49b-23: na bo dhi'i mdzad pa'i gsang chen sgron ma'i dam
T02D3726:49b-24: tshig las / nyan thos tshul khrims theg chen sdom pa dang //
T02D3726:49b-25: sa bdag khrims las 'da' bar mi bya'o //
T02D3726:49b-27: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
T02D3726:49b-28: byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni //
T02D3726:49b-29: lha gzhan dag la mi mos dang //
T02D3726:49b-30: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang //
T02D3726:49b-31: de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis //
T02D3726:49b-32: gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang //
T02D3726:49b-33: brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang //
T02D3726:49b-34: khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni //
T02D3726:49b-35: rig sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya //
T02D3726:49b-36: gal te de ni rab byung na //
T02D3726:49b-37: sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya //
T02D3726:49b-38: so sor thar dang byang chub sems //
T02D3726:49b-40: zhes 'byung bas sdom pa dang dam tshig mtha' dag la gnas par bya'o //
T02D3726:49b-41: de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas thog mar rig sngags gzung ba'i dam tshig la gnas par bya'o //
T02D3726:50a-0: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po @50a * //
T02D3726:50a-2: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D3726:50a-3: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D3726:50a-4: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-5: tshul khrims kyi ni sdom pa dang //
T02D3726:50a-6: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D3726:50a-7: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D3726:50a-8: de bzhin brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-9: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D3726:50a-10: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D3726:50a-11: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i //
T02D3726:50a-12: sdom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-13: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D3726:50a-14: slob dpon nyid kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-15: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang ;
T02D3726:50a-16: / yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-17: rin chen rigs mchog chen po las //
T02D3726:50a-18: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D3726:50a-19: nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu //
T02D3726:50a-20: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D3726:50a-21: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D3726:50a-22: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa las //
T02D3726:50a-23: phyi nang gsang pa'i theg pa gsum //
T02D3726:50a-24: dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-25: las kyi rigs mchog chen po las //
T02D3726:50a-26: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D3726:50a-27: yang dag nyid du gzung par bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-28: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-29: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D3726:50a-30: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi ;
T02D3726:50a-31: / sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D3726:50a-32: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D3726:50a-33: ma rgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral //
T02D3726:50a-34: ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol //
T02D3726:50a-35: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D3726:50a-36: mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod //
T02D3726:50a-37: dus 'di nas ni bzung nas su ;
T02D3726:50a-38: / ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02D3726:50a-39: bdag ni rab tu gnas par bgyi //
T02D3726:50a-40: lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis //
T02D3726:50a-41: mi dge ba ni rnam bcu dang //
T02D3726:50a-42: bag med pa yi gnas byung ba //
T02D3726:50a-43: 'bru chang bcos pa'i chang dag dang //
T02D3726:50a-44: theg pa dman la 'dod pa dang //
T02D3726:50a-45: de bzhin lha dang lha min dang ;
T02D3726:50a-46: / gsang ba pa rnams brnyas pa dang //
T02D3726:50a-47: phyag rgya mtshan ma bzhon pa dang //
T02D3726:50a-48: mtshon cha la sogs 'gom pa rnams //
T02D3726:50a-49: dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni //
T02D3726:50a-50: ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar //
T02D3726:50a-51: bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi'o //
T02D3726:50b-0: gal te rig sngags gzung ba nyid @50b du nges pas ni /
T02D3726:50b-1: sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin ma bsrungs na /
T02D3726:50b-3: bdag nyid la 'khu par byed pa /
T02D3726:50b-4: dngos grub chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa //
T02D3726:50b-5: de ni g-yon can shing rul ba lta bu yin no //
T02D3726:50b-6: dam tshig la mi gnas par gsang sngags tshig tsam
T02D3726:50b-7: gyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don du las sna tshogs
T02D3726:50b-8: byed pa'o // dper na mdze can nang na 'bus
T02D3726:50b-9: rnyings pa la phyi rol gyi gos dang rgyan gyis
T02D3726:50b-10: bkab pa lta bu yin no //
T02D3726:50b-11: des ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos //
T02D3726:50b-12: de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smod cing bshung ba yin no //
T02D3726:50b-13: gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sgrub pa dang /
T02D3726:50b-14: gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byed pa ni /
T02D3726:50b-15: dus yun ring por bdag gi sems kyi rgyud sbyangs pa dang /
T02D3726:50b-16: sdom pa dang dam tshig la sngags spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas /
T02D3726:50b-17: dben par tshul bzhin du las byas nas dngos grub
T02D3726:50b-18: tu yang 'gyur la gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
T02D3726:50b-20: dam tshig spangs te gzu lums su gsang sngags dgongs pas bshad pa'i don /
T02D3726:50b-21: sgra ji bzhin du bzung nas snod min pa'i slob ma dang /
T02D3726:50b-22: grong la sogs par log par spyad na ni /
T02D3726:50b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rgyud khyad du bsad pas slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /
T02D3726:50b-24: aindra bh'u ti la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas kyi
T02D3726:50b-25: tshig gi bdud rtsi spangs pa yin pas bdag bde
T02D3726:50b-26: legs su 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis zas dug
T02D3726:50b-27: dang bcas pa bzhin du spang bar bya'o //
T02D3726:50b-28: de bas na dngos grub kyi snod du rung ba'i sgrub pa pos //
T02D3726:50b-29: dang por dam tshig mnos pa nyid nas bzung nas
T02D3726:50b-30: byang chub kyi snying po'i par du mi nyams par
T02D3726:50b-31: bya'o // phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas ni dam tshig gnyis bsrung ste /
T02D3726:50b-34: de la bza' ba'i dam tshig / ga phur mtshal dang pi pi ling //
T02D3726:50b-35: tsandan dmar dang gur gum sogs //
T02D3726:50b-36: man ngag bzhin du sgrub pa pos //
T02D3726:50b-37: rtag tu bsten cing bza' bar bgyi //
T02D3726:50b-38: bsrung ba dag gi dam tshig ni //
T02D3726:50b-39: rang lus phyag rgya nyid bsgoms la //
T02D3726:50b-40: ma lus 'gro ba'i tshogs bsam bya //
T02D3726:51a-2: rdo rje de ni spun rnams la //
T02D3726:51a-3: gtso dang sems dpa' bskyed par bya //
T02D3726:51a-4: 'di ni sku yi dam tshig ste //
T02D3726:51a-5: tshul khrims bsrung la brtson par bya //
T02D3726:51a-6: sred 'byung ngag gi skyon spangs te //
T02D3726:51a-7: rig sngags lha yi snying po dang //
T02D3726:51a-8: rdo rje phra sogs rtse gcig pas ;
T02D3726:51a-9: / rgyu na mi 'chad par bzlas par bya //
T02D3726:51a-10: de ni gsung gi dam tshig ste //
T02D3726:51a-12: rgyun du ting 'dzin gnyis po dang //
T02D3726:51a-13: spyod bzhin dran pas zin par bya //
T02D3726:51a-14: thun mong ma yin gsang chen dang //
T02D3726:51a-15: man ngag gzhan du mi spel lo //
T02D3726:51a-16: lta dang spyod dang lha dag dang //
T02D3726:51a-17: slob dpon mchog gnyis gsang ba ste //
T02D3726:51a-18: 'di dag gsang chen gzhan du min //
T02D3726:51a-19: 'di dag thugs kyi dam tshig go //
T02D3726:51a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'di //
T02D3726:51a-21: srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo //
T02D3726:51a-22: rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa yi //
T02D3726:51a-23: dam tshig bzhi la gnas par bya ;
T02D3726:51a-24: / ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi ni //
T02D3726:51a-25: phas pham par ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02D3726:51a-26: spang zhing 'dor bar mi bya ste //
T02D3726:51a-27: rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya //
T02D3726:51a-28: slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang //
T02D3726:51a-29: bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang //
T02D3726:51a-30: sdang bas spun gyi sngags min smra //
T02D3726:51a-31: byams pa chen po rnam spong dang //
T02D3726:51a-32: byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang //
T02D3726:51a-33: theg pa gsum la smod pa dang //
T02D3726:51a-34: skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang //
T02D3726:51a-35: rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod //
T02D3726:51a-36: dam pa'i chos la yid gnyis za //
T02D3726:51a-37: gdug la byams dang chags bral dang //
T02D3726:51a-38: chos la gnyis su 'byed pa dang ;
T02D3726:51a-39: / dang pa'i sems la rab tu smod //
T02D3726:51a-40: dam tshig bsten pa ji snyed pa //
T02D3726:51a-41: brtags pa'i rig ma smod pa ste //
T02D3726:51a-42: rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba des //
T02D3726:51a-43: sngags pa'i dam tshig zad par 'gyur //
T02D3726:51a-44: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D3726:51a-45: nyin re bzhin ni bzla bar bya //
T02D3726:51a-46: gal te nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa //
T02D3726:51a-47: kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur //
T02D3726:51a-48: dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i //
T02D3726:51a-49: rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang //
T02D3726:51a-50: tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang //
T02D3726:51a-51: gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang //
T02D3726:51a-52: sems can dad dang ldan pa la //
T02D3726:51a-53: dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang //
T02D3726:51b-0: nyan thos @51b dag tu rlom byed pa'i //
T02D3726:51b-1: nang du zhag bdun 'dug pa dang //
T02D3726:51b-2: sbyor ba nges par ma byas pa'i //
T02D3726:51b-3: snod min gsang ba ston pa rnams //
T02D3726:51b-4: kha na ma tho bcas 'gyur te //
T02D3726:51b-5: sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad //
T02D3726:51b-7: bdud dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel //
T02D3726:51b-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas kyang dam tshig rnams /
T02D3726:51b-10: dang po thob pa nyid nas byang chub chen po'i bar du yang dag par gzung ngo //
T02D3726:51b-11: gal te nyams par byas na don dam par bsrung du med pa dang /
T02D3726:51b-12: dgongs pa'i don gyi tshig gi gzugs brnyan la brten
T02D3726:51b-13: nas dam tshig mi bsrung bar gzu lums su dkyil
T02D3726:51b-14: 'khor la sogs pa byed pa ni 'phags pa dang
T02D3726:51b-16: yon tan de gsang sngags seng ge'i 'o ma lta
T02D3726:51b-17: bu skye bo snod dang mi ldan pa'i mi la
T02D3726:51b-18: bstan pa dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las
T02D3726:51b-19: byas pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro
T02D3726:51b-21: bdag dang gzhan rlag par byed pa sangs rgyas dang
T02D3726:51b-22: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyab kyis phyogs pa
T02D3726:51b-23: de nam du yang dngos grub kyi snod du mi
T02D3726:51b-25: de lta bas na dam tshig rnams lus dang srog la ltos pa med par bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3726:51b-26: dam tshig nyams pa gso ba ni gnang ste /
T02D3726:51b-27: thun mtshams sbyor ba las gyur na //
T02D3726:51b-28: bde gshegs las rigs bsam gtan gyis //
T02D3726:51b-29: de yi nyes pa bsal bar bya //
T02D3726:51b-30: gser sbyangs dri med lta bur 'gyur //
T02D3726:51b-31: sbyor ba'i yan lag sbom nyams na //
T02D3726:51b-32: mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya //
T02D3726:51b-33: 'phags la bzod gsol dam bcas na //
T02D3726:51b-34: phyin chad bsdams te gus par blang //
T02D3726:51b-35: rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02D3726:51b-36: rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid las //
T02D3726:51b-37: dang por rigs bdag dkyil 'khor du //
T02D3726:51b-38: tshul bzhin yang dag blang bar bya //
T02D3726:51b-39: de ltar ma bshags par blangs bas nyams pa khyad
T02D3726:51b-40: du gsod cing de'i nyes pa 'phel ba dang bcas
T02D3726:51b-41: par gyur na skyon che ste /
T02D3726:51b-42: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D3726:51b-43: sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D3726:51b-44: de bzhin chos kyi sems dpa' dang //
T02D3726:51b-45: rmongs pa 'gal bar byas nas ni //
T02D3726:52a-3: de lta bas na sangs rgyas dbu 'gas na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02D3726:52a-4: dam tshig nyams pas ni bdag nyid dang /
T02D3726:52a-5: gzhan phyogs su yang nyes pa sna tshogs su 'byung la //
T02D3726:52a-6: phyi mar yang bskal ba gsum la sogs par ngan 'gror 'gro'o//
T02D3726:52a-7: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi rgyud chen po las /
T02D3726:52a-8: dam tshig med cing ngan spyod pa //
T02D3726:52a-9: bslus 'gyur ngan pa'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D3726:52a-10: mkha' 'gro ma yis zos nas kyang //
T02D3726:52a-11: de las nga ni skyob mi byed //
T02D3726:52a-12: gsang ba pa yi nang nas ni //
T02D3726:52a-13: sgrub pa po de phyugs dang 'dra //
T02D3726:52a-15: bla ma lnga bcu pa las kyang /
T02D3726:52a-16: slob dpon la ni smod pa de //
T02D3726:52a-17: yams dang 'tshe ba'i nad rnams dang //
T02D3726:52a-18: gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyis //
T02D3726:52a-20: rgyal po me dang sbrul gdug dang //
T02D3726:52a-21: chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun po dang //
T02D3726:52a-22: gdon dang log 'dren rnams kyis kyang //
T02D3726:52a-23: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro //
T02D3726:52a-24: nam yang slob dpon dag gi ni //
T02D3726:52a-25: kun du sems dkrugs mi bya ste //
T02D3726:52a-26: gal te rmongs pas byed 'gyur na //
T02D3726:52a-27: dmyal bar nges par 'tshed par nges //
T02D3726:52a-28: mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i //
T02D3726:52a-29: dmyal ba bsten pa gang yin pa //
T02D3726:52a-30: slob dpon la ni smod pa dag //
T02D3726:52a-31: der ni gnas par yang dag bshad //
T02D3726:52a-32: zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D3726:52a-33: dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa las //
T02D3726:52a-34: sangs rgyas byang chub dpa' rnams //
T02D3726:52a-35: byin gyis brlabs par mi mdzad de //
T02D3726:52a-36: spos dang me tog la sogs pa //
T02D3726:52a-37: phul yang ba zhes par mi 'gyur te //
T02D3726:52a-38: dang dang dug dang dgra rnams kyis //
T02D3726:52a-39: bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro //
T02D3726:52a-41: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog las kyang /
T02D3726:52a-43: ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02D3726:52a-44: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D3726:52a-45: lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang //
T02D3726:52a-46: sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor bcas //
T02D3726:52a-47: de dag la ni snying ring nas //
T02D3726:52a-48: snying nas khrag chen drangs nas 'thung //
T02D3726:52a-51: dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang //
T02D3726:52b-0: dam tshig rnam @52b par spangs pa dang //
T02D3726:52b-1: gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas //
T02D3726:52b-2: bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub po //
T02D3726:52b-4: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las /
T02D3726:52b-6: sdang sems ldan pa de dag ni //
T02D3726:52b-7: mgo ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D3726:52b-8: rdo rje rnams kyis rtag tu 'gems //
T02D3726:52b-10: yang mtshams med lda byas ba'i sdig pa ni bla'i /
T02D3726:52b-11: gsang sngags log par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no //
T02D3726:52b-14: bskal ba grangs med gsum du ni //
T02D3726:52b-15: mnar med shin tu mi bzad sogs //
T02D3726:52b-16: bcu drug dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur //
T02D3726:52b-19: dam tshig nyams pa sdug bsngal zhing //
T02D3726:52b-20: lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni //
T02D3726:52b-21: de yi yon tan nyams 'gyur zhing //
T02D3726:52b-23: shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni //
T02D3726:52b-24: bskal ba bye ba brgya phrag tu //
T02D3726:52b-26: gdol ba'am dman pa'i rigs su skye //
T02D3726:52b-27: lkugs par skye'am yang na 'on par skye //
T02D3726:52b-29: de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las //
T02D3726:52b-30: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D3726:52b-31: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02D3726:52b-33: dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D3726:52b-34: drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dang //
T02D3726:52b-35: ma mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pas //
T02D3726:52b-36: gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying //
T02D3726:52b-39: gal te dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na //
T02D3726:52b-40: pha gsod 'gro ba yin pa dang //
T02D3726:52b-41: ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang //
T02D3726:52b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas /
T02D3726:52b-44: dam tshig nyams na skyon che bas na lus dang
T02D3726:52b-45: srog gi phyir yang mi gtang bar bsrungs bar bya'o
T02D3726:52b-46: // sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung ba yang don che ste /
T02D3726:52b-47: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D3726:52b-48: 'gro ba'i don dang de don du //
T02D3726:52b-49: dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas nas //
T02D3726:52b-50: bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang ;
T02D3726:52b-51: / bsgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po //
T02D3726:52b-52: stong phrag brgya yi kha min par //
T02D3726:52b-53: kha cig gis kyang brjod mi nus //
T02D3726:53a-2: tshul bzhin bsrung dang sgrub pa yis //
T02D3726:53a-3: rgyal ba thams cad mnyes gyur nas //
T02D3726:53a-6: dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje sta //
T02D3726:53a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
T02D3726:53a-9: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D3726:53a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcas pa yi //
T02D3726:53a-11: brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims dang //
T02D3726:53a-12: spyod pa bzlas pa'i gzhi rnams la //
T02D3726:53a-13: gal te gnas na de yi tshe //
T02D3726:53a-14: sngags pas 'di ltar sngags bsgrub po //
T02D3726:53a-16: slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i sgrub thabs las /
T02D3726:53a-17: sngags pas rnam pa 'di dag gis //
T02D3726:53a-18: dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na //
T02D3726:53a-19: tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyis //
T02D3726:53a-20: rdo rje gsung nyid thob par 'gyur //
T02D3726:53a-22: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D3726:53a-23: gangg'a'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems
T02D3726:53a-24: dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang chub sems
T02D3726:53a-26: gsang ba 'dus pa la dga' zhing de'i dam tshig
T02D3726:53a-27: la gnas shing bsgrubs na tshe 'di nyid la mngon
T02D3726:53a-28: par 'tshang rgya'o // rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul
T02D3726:53a-29: dra ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
T02D3726:53a-30: par 'tshang rgya'o // las / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam spyor te //
T02D3726:53a-31: lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas //
T02D3726:53a-32: nga yi snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs //
T02D3726:53a-33: rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na //
T02D3726:53a-34: rnal 'byor ldan pa de tshe la //
T02D3726:53a-35: ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D3726:53a-37: gzhung gzhan las thabs kyi dam tshig thams cad la spyod cing mi nyams par bsrungs la /
T02D3726:53a-38: shes rab kyis bsrung du med par shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa mchog ces bya'o //
T02D3726:53a-39: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D3726:53a-40: rnam par mi rtog las byung ba'i //
T02D3726:53a-41: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs //
T02D3726:53a-42: theg pa mchog 'di bla med pa //
T02D3726:53a-43: mchog tu blar gyur sgrub par byed //
T02D3726:53a-44: rigs ngan sme sha can la sogs //
T02D3726:53a-45: gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams //
T02D3726:53a-46: theg pa bla na med pa yi //
T02D3726:53a-48: mtshams med pa la sogs pa yi //
T02D3726:53a-49: sems can dag gis bsgrubs na 'grub //
T02D3726:53b-0: srog @53b gcod pa yi sems can rnams //
T02D3726:53b-1: brdzun du smra par dad pa dang //
T02D3726:53b-2: gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang //
T02D3726:53b-3: rtag tu 'dod la spyod pa dag //
T02D3726:53b-4: de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur //
T02D3726:53b-7: de ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D3726:53b-8: yar ngo'i zla ba ji bzhin du //
T02D3726:53b-11: brtson 'grus dman pa la la zhig //
T02D3726:53b-12: sangs rgyas thob par ma gyur kyang //
T02D3726:53b-13: 'khor los sgyur rgyal bde ba ni //
T02D3726:53b-14: skye ba kun du thob par 'gyur //
T02D3726:53b-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams ni //
T02D3726:53b-16: phyogs bcu dus gsum yod pa rnams //
T02D3726:53b-17: de yi ba spu'i khung bu zhes //
T02D3726:53b-18: rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu gsungs //
T02D3726:53b-21: sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig pas //
T02D3726:53b-22: rnam pa slu ba med pa'i sems //
T02D3726:53b-23: de bas brtan pa bskyed par bya //
T02D3726:53b-24: 'di byas pa yis rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D3726:53b-25: dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can kun mnyes //
T02D3726:53b-26: bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa yang //
T02D3726:53b-27: glags skabs tshol par mi byed cing //
T02D3726:53b-28: phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa //
T02D3726:53b-29: dgyes pas rtag tu bsrung ba mdzad //
T02D3726:53b-32: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che
T02D3726:53b-33: sna bdun gyis bkang ste 'phags pa rnams la phul
T02D3726:53b-34: pa bas / gang gis dam tshig la yang dag
T02D3726:53b-35: par gnas te 'du 'dzi spangs te dgon pa la
T02D3726:53b-36: gnas nas skad cig tsam ring nge 'dzin gnyis kyis
T02D3726:53b-37: mnyam par gzhag na de gnyis las mnyam par gzhag
T02D3726:53b-38: pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med
T02D3726:53b-40: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtshan gyis
T02D3726:53b-41: brgyan pa ni gling bzhi la dbang pa'i mthu yod
T02D3726:53b-42: cing chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur to //
T02D3726:53b-43: de bzhin du rgyal ba'i sras dam tshig dang sdom
T02D3726:53b-44: pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan
T02D3726:53b-45: pa ni ring por mi thogs par skye ba bdun
T02D3726:53b-47: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin no //
T02D3726:53b-48: yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang
T02D3726:53b-49: gi rgyal po ni su'i spyi gtsug na yong pa
T02D3726:53b-50: la 'gro ba gang gis kyang bar mi chod do
T02D3726:53b-51: // de bzhin du sngags pa gang zhig sdom pa
T02D3726:54a-0: dang dam tshig gi nor bus sgo gsum @54a *
T02D3726:54a-1: // // brgyan pa la bdud la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar du mi chod do //
T02D3726:54a-2: yang skyes bu mig dang rkang bar ldan pa ni
T02D3726:54a-3: kang 'gro ba'i gnas su phyin cing dgos pa thams
T02D3726:54a-5: mnyam pa'i dam tshig mig dang 'dra ba dang spyod
T02D3726:54a-6: pa'i dam tshig rkang pa dang 'dra ba la brten
T02D3726:54a-7: te ye shes kyi lam drang du zhugs pas thams
T02D3726:54a-8: cad mkhyen pa'i nor bu blangs te /
T02D3726:54a-9: bdag dang gzhan gyi don lhun gyis grub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3726:54a-10: yang dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs la sman 'bral bar dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de /
T02D3726:54a-11: de gang gis rnyed pa de ni dug dang nad
T02D3726:54a-12: la sogs pa rtsa ba nas 'byin cing tshe ring
T02D3726:54a-14: de bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs nor bu rin po che'i nor bu blangs te /
T02D3726:54a-15: las dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang zhig dam
T02D3726:54a-16: tshig rnams kyi sman thob pas 'khor pa thog ma
T02D3726:54a-17: med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags dang nyon mongs
T02D3726:54a-18: pa'i nad thams cad zhi zhing byang la bla na
T02D3726:54a-19: med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mi
T02D3726:54a-21: dper na ded dpon bsod nams kyis gzi brjid dang
T02D3726:54a-22: thabs dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te
T02D3726:54a-23: / rin po che'i gling du phyin te nor bu
T02D3726:54a-24: rin po che blangs nas bdag dang gzhan la phan
T02D3726:54a-25: / 'dogs so ; / de bzhin du dge ba'i
T02D3726:54a-26: bshes gnyen 'gro ba 'khor ba las 'don pa'i ded
T02D3726:54a-28: tshul khrims dang dam tshig tu sbyar nas thabs la mkhas pa dang /
T02D3726:54a-29: brtson 'grus kyi skya ba bskyod nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te /
T02D3726:54a-30: dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi nor bu blangs te /
T02D3726:54a-31: bdag dang gzhan la phan 'do kas so //
T02D3726:54a-32: de lta bas na rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkhyen
T02D3726:54a-33: pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dag gis dam
T02D3726:54a-34: tshig dang sdom pa mtha' dag tshul bzhin bsrungs la
T02D3726:54a-35: / rgyud dang sgrub thabs dang mthun par dgongs pa'i gnas su nam lhun gyis grub ba'i bar du /
T02D3726:54a-36: rdo shing ngam ri dags shi ba'i ro bzhin du gnas te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3726:54a-37: bdag nyid dran gso rnal 'byor pa la phan gdags phyir //
T02D3726:54a-38: rgyud dang sgrub thabs dag las dam tshig mdor bsdus pas //
T02D3726:54a-39: 'phags dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gnod ste bzod par gsol //
T02D3726:54b-0: @54b des ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rdo rje 'dzin
T02D3726:54b-1: thob shog / dbang pos mtshan pa'i yul gyi rtsa
T02D3726:54b-2: na gnas pa'i slob dpon rdzny'a na bo dhis mdzad
T02D3726:54b-3: pa / las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus ba rdzogs so /
T02D3726:54b-5: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gupta dang /
